name: Nobunaga's Shadow
description:
"Nobunaga's Shadow" is a story-driven pixely RPG set in old Japan.

Unveil Ryuuei's story, a clueless novice shinobi who was sent away from his home province to spy on a prominent warlord of the Oda clan, Oda Nobunaga. Our hero soon finds himself torn between working for his old masters and serving under the Oda clan's banner... and it's up to you to decide how his story goes.

Featuring:
  • meaningful story choices
  • turn-based combat
  • exploration
  • pixel art graphics
  • multiple endings
